alert.note: Alert for Allen; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 11:22AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson Davis and southwestern Allen Parishes through 1145 AM CDT... At 1121 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Leblanc, or near Kinder, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kinder, Fenton, Reeves, Leblanc and Buller. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
